talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Eclair broke a taboo. So she is isolated deep in the Sanctum preventing Border of Darkness from spreading. I thought she could get out of there for a short moment but this isn't the time for that now....(Castia's face grew solemn)

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Yes... there is still a way.
I'm not sure but... It is only you who can do that.
Because you are a Eclair's boy.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
The dimension's crack happens only in Border of Darkness but sometimes it reaches to Light Land beyond the line.
If some requirements are ready, you can find the crack and sneak into it.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Do you know Lotus Marsh's Riverwort Wharf? I can feel something cracking the dimension around the area. Some strong power continuously influences on it.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Because of that, the part of Border of Darkness is reaching to that place so many Priestesses of Darkness is devoting to preventing spreading. It should be banned to go there... but you are the except.
<html>$As you wish$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
But {user_name}....
(Priestess of Darkness Castia stares at you.)
<html>$As you wish$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Now let's go to Riverwort Wharf to search the Special Dimensional Gap.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
At there, Eclair will not be disturbed to see you even though there is a dangerous chaos land.

* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Now, go to Riverwort Wharf and look for the Special Dimensional Gap.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
.......
(says nothing with a disconsolate look)

$???$
(glittering light is leaking out)

$???$
(There's something over the light, but it's too far to reach on it.)

* You can get Last Hardship when reaching up to level 46

$???$
(There's something over the light, but it's too far to reach on it.)

* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

$???$
(There's some strange place over the crack of light.)

$???$
(It looks like it's possible to get in there if stretching hands.)

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Go to Riverwort Wharf and find the Special Dimensional Gap. That's the only place where Éclair can let you enter without trouble though it's a dangerous land of chaos.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
You came to meet me up to this place.
Attraction from the blood tie is so strong that you made this meeting possible.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
...Yes. My {user_nick}.
I've been always dreaming to meet you but this kind of way isn't what I want.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
I wished you forget me with the childhood memory.
I always prayed you to love people and be loved by people as a normal human.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It seems like she gets everything in a moment.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
You are... strong. I wanted to watch your life from a distance. But I couldn't even do that and was suffering from worries and anxieties. You were contaminated by Black Dragon's blood.... I feel lethargic as a mother.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
You may be able to balance the Black Dragon's blood because you succeeded my blood as Protector of Pledge.
It must be tough fighting but if you enhance your power... and then you will.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you saying that putting Crest of Pledge into me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Yes. If you met Priestess of Darkness Castia, you might hear from her. You must have felt the limitation of your power. If you make up for them and train yourself more professional abilities, you will be stronger than now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Limitations.... Of course I want to overcome my limitations.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Yes. If you put Crest of Pledge into your body, you will be much stronger than what you feel of yourself now.
You can use unimaginabletechniquesor have stronger power.

$???$
(There's some strange place over the crack of light)

$???$
(It looks like it's possible to get in there if stretching hands)

$???$
(There's something over the light, but it's too far to reach on it.)

* This quest cannot be continued if you have a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair${action:Talk3}
Which way do you want to go?
This would be the last time to meet you. I want to be helpful for you even for a small thing.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Here is the land betweenBorder of Darkness and Light World colliding and making chaos.
In this place, I can utilize my ability to show your limitations inside of you.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Your inside limitations.... You will see your shadowin front of you.
If you fight and win it, you will certainly realize what you're supposed to do.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
You might know you can choose Guardian or Crusaderfrom Castia.
Which one do you want to go for?

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Guardiansare succeeded by Paladins' defense skills so they can disturb enemies' eyes, and they can support companies with a different kind of attacking skills.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
And, Crusadersare succeeded by Paladins' offence skills. They are able to cover both wide-range and pin-point utilizing energy and physics at the same time.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
You might know you can choose Saint or Inquisitorfrom Castia.
Which one do you want to go for?

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Saintsare succeeded by Priests' passive skills. You can support your companies by Relic and Buff enhancing their life sustainability and dealing ability.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
And Inquisitorsare succeeded by Priests' offence skills. You can attack enemies in a wide range with strong light-attribute skills.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Extreme power is a dangerous thing… Your inner self may also get to face a shadow like you.
You would be able to control the power if you can win the shadow.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
I will show you the hidden powers within you.
I trust that you will come back here from the chaos by following the light after you have found the path you want.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
I gave you new skills temporarily.
Press [K] button and check the results. It is totally up to your decision whether to go or not.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair${action:Talk}
Your decision, this is your potential power.
Now... go to the shadowand check the power while beating it.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
How was your self-fighting? My {user_nick}.
Are you satisfied that you overcome your limitations?

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
If you have something left in your mind, I can help you until it vanishes in your mind.
Whatever you choose to go, just remember it is your own life.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Okay. You decided.
Then... I will give you the last thing that I can do.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Please give meCrest of Pledge.
I'm going to put it deeply into your chaotic heart so that you can walk on your own way whenever wavering and suffering.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Which way do you want to go?

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Which way do you want to go?

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
It looks like the decision has not yet been made.
I will bury the Pledge Heraldry deep in your heart and help you go your way even during testing and painful times.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
If you are still curious about the path not taken, I will help you with my powers until that doubt disappears.
Whatever path you choose, it is your own life so please don't forget that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>See the paths that can be selected.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
The time has come to make up your mind.
Have you decided or do ou want to try the other path?

* The job cannot be changed once selected.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair${action:Talk2}
Well. Sincere {user_nick}, Walking on your own way ....
Just don't forget that I always pray for you even though we may not meet again.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
This is also my decision. My destiny... and my decision.
My love {user_nick}, don't forget.
There's nothing fixed in the world. Destinyis totally up to your decision.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
Live freely. Walk on your own way in an imposing manner without any doubt on your decision.
If, even If you might know you will regret something in the future, don't forget freedom and do the thing that you believe.

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair$
I deeply appreciate my destiny meeting you again.
I'm so happy as a mother of you so I wish you are as well..
...

$Priestess of Darkness Eclair${action:Talk}
...My lovely son {user_nick}....
as you wish.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
You came back.
Seeing {user_nick}'s face expression, I realized you met Eclair.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
How about you? Aren't you happy?
With the sad look, you look like inside of your confusions and pains have gone out of you.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Knowing yourself and walking on the right way are quite difficult. While living in the world existing infinite possibilities, {user_nick}will waver a lot of times and be forced to decide something.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
However because there's risk of decision, there's a joy of decision as well.
The joy for freedom.
(Castia smiles slightly)

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Ah, didn't you get it? Crest of Pledge is already in your heart.
Eclair put it deeply into your heart. The remaining is.. decisions.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Yes. You really do have the potential. However, I'm afraid I can't help you with your choice. You should ask my colleague who would be much more helpful to you.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia${action:Talk}
Go see Master Cleric Johan at Lotus Marsh.
I've never met him but I will write a letter so he can help you.

$Master Cleric Johan$
I was very surpirsed to receive a letter from a Priestess of Darkness, but it is more suprising to see you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would like to become a Guardian.</html>
<html>I would like to become a Crusader.</html>
<html>I will have to think about it a little more.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Johan$
Yes, that's her name. Anyway I have to do what I have been asked to do.
I will bring out your potential.
Here... What do you want to be?
* You cannot change after the selection.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would like to be a Saint.</html>
<html>I would like to be a Inquisitor.</html>
<html>I will have to think about it a little more.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Cleric Johan$
Yes, that's her name. Anyway I have to do what I asked to do.
I will bring out your potential.
Here... What do you want to be?
* You cannot change after the selection.

$Master Cleric Johan$
Please come back to me once you have decided.
Please remember, it's not good to consider for a long time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will think about it a little bit more.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$[Specialization] Guardian$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would like to think for a bit.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$[Specialization] Crusader$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would like to think for a bit.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$[Specialization] Saint$</html>
<html>$[Specialization] Inquisitor$</html>

$Master Cleric Johan${action:Talk}
At the end of the letter, it says.
You will face many choices in the future.
Don't forget, believe and having faith in your choice is true courage please.

$Master Cleric Johan$
That is right. That is the name.
Anyway, I ought to do what I have been requested. An easy way to balance your powers would be for you to become stronger.

$Master Cleric Johan$
You don't have to worry if you keep training. But for now, you would have to rely on equipment.
I will give you some equipment that is suitable for the power you've gained.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

${user_class}$

*Specialization completed.

qstep_change.comment: 전직 완료 후 포기, 재진입 시 처리

journal.title: To Riverwort Wharf
journal.contents:
Go to Riverwort Wharf and find the Special Dimensional Gap.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf → ???
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with something at Riverwort Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Find the Special Dimensional Gap at Riverwort Wharf.

journal.title: Priestess of Darkness Eclair
journal.contents:
Enter the Special Dimensional Gap in Riverwort Wharf and meet Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

Riverwort Wharf → Special Dimensional Gap (Priestess of Darkness Eclair)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Eclair at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Eclair at the Special Dimensional Gap.

journal.title: Several choices
journal.contents:
Keep talking with Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

Riverwort Wharf → Special Dimensional Gap (Priestess of Darkness Eclair)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Eclair at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Listen more stories from Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

journal.title: Fighting against myself
journal.contents:
Talk to Priestess of Darkness Eclair at the Special Dimensional Gap and you can fight against your own shadow.

Riverwort Wharf (Special Dimensional Gap) → Battle with the Shadow
journal.destination: (Solo) Battle with the shadow at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Battle with the shadow deep inside the Special Dimensional Gap.

journal.title: The way of choice
journal.contents:
Talk with Priestess of Darkness Éclair and choose your path. You can also hear about the other path or experience it again.

Riverwort Wharf → Special Dimensional Gap (Priestess of Darkness Eclair)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Eclair at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Eclair again.

journal.title: Left messages
journal.contents:
Keep talking with Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

Riverwort Wharf → Special Dimensional Gap (Priestess of Darkness Eclair)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk with Eclair at the Dimensional Gap
journal.todo_msg: Listen the last story of Priestess of Darkness Eclair.

journal.title: Choice
journal.contents:
Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia, and decide which way to go.

* You can't change after you decided the job.

Border of Darkness Surpah watchtower → Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.destination: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia.

journal.title: Choice
journal.contents:
Talk to Master Cleric Johan and choose your Job change.

* Once you choose the job, you can't change.

Lotus Marsh → Master Cleric Johan
